data.price: Àwọn tó ń tẹ́tí gbọ́ ọ̀rọ̀, tí wọ́n sì ń tẹ̀lé èyí tó dára jùlọ nínú rẹ̀, àwọn wọ̀nyẹn ni àwọn tí Allāhu fi mọ̀nà. Àwọn wọ̀nyẹn, àwọn ni onílàákàyè.
data.arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ يَسۡتَمِعُونَ ٱلۡقَوۡلَ فَيَتَّبِعُونَ أَحۡسَنَهُۥٓۚ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ هَدَىٰهُمُ ٱللَّهُۖ وَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمۡ أُوْلُواْ ٱلۡأَلۡبَٰبِ

dua.name: Dua for Divine Guidance
dua.significanceReason: Emphasizes listening to diverse wisdom and following the best guidance, promoting intellectual and spiritual openness.
